PHPDocumentor usage ... [more info at http://phpdocumentor.org/]
snippet commands :
"phpdoc_c" - Class "phpdoc_cp" - Class (post documentation) "phpdoc_d" - Define inline constant "phpdoc_dp" - Define inline constant (post documentation) "phpdoc_f" - Function "phpdoc_fp" - Function (post documentation) "phpdoc_h" - Document header "phpdoc_i" - Interface class "phpdoc_s" - Abstract function signature "phpdoc_v" - Class variable "phpdoc_vp" - Class variable (post documentation) "phpdoc_u" - This usage information
TextMate shell variables : \$TM_ORGANIZATION_NAME -- default value of @copyright [+ date] \$PHPDOC_AUTHOR -- [optional] default value of @author (realname will be used if not set) [ Preferences > Advanced > Shell Variables ]
NOTE: Commands marked as "post documentation" are designed for undocumented code -- in other words, a comment block is added at the cursor position.
